content.description: Use some fun body positioning to pull the over the low crux that seems hard for the grade and can shut down shorter climbers. A short slabby section leads into a short vertical section with great holds.  The chains are offset and require a cordelette or sling to equalize your anchor.  You can scramble around the back to retrieve gear.
content.protection: 3 Bolts and a bolted anchor with chains.  Bring a cordelette or sling to equalize the anchor.
content.location: Use the PK Approach.  This approach brings you down between the Yes Ma'am boulder and the P.K. Boulder.  Turn right (North) to get to the Yes Ma'am boulder.  This is the only route on the free standing boulder.

content.description: Relatively unknown boulder with a single route on it that doesn't draw much traffic.
